column4: Hi everyone, I need some help please. Somehow I managed to screw my ubuntu installation (which is a fairly fresh install), so I reinstalled it. I used the same partitions as before without formatting. After it loaded, I enabled the nvidia drivers and ran an update on the installation. after a reboot, I get a message of "Gave up waiting for root device. Common problems: ....". I get a BusyBox shell but for some reason I can't type anyt
